name: Scrounger
ability: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller & choose a player: learn a true statement. If they’re evil, it’s false instead.

jinxes.reason: The Beachcomber can learn information the Scrounger can learn.

firstNightReminder: Show the Insomniac the nearest "Each night" character. :reminder:
name: Insomniac
ability: You start knowing the nearest “Each night” character (not the Demon), or that none are in play.

jinxes.reason: If the Amnesiac has an “Each night” ability, the Insomniac can learn the Amnesiac.
If the Sleepwalker has an “Each night” ability, the Insomniac can learn the Sleepwalker.

firstNightReminder: Show the Huntress the nearest Minion character :reminder:, then point to your left or your right to indicate which direction it's closer in.
name: Huntress
ability: You start knowing the nearest Minion character & whether it’s clockwise or anticlockwise from you.

jinxes.reason: If the Huntress learns the Vizier is in play, the Vizier's existence is not announced by the Storyteller.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Huntress.

firstNightReminder: Show the Teacher the nearest *"Once per game"* character. :reminder:
name: Teacher
ability: You start knowing the nearest “Once per game” character (not the Demon), or that none are in play.

jinxes.reason: If the Amnesiac has a “Once per game” ability, the Teacher can learn the Amnesiac.
If the Sleepwalker has a “Once per game” ability, the Teacher can learn the Sleepwalker.

firstNightReminder: Show the Tax Collector two in-play characters, mark them with *"Shown"* :reminder:. The Tax Collector holds up a number of fingers: note that number.
otherNightReminder: On the night the Tax Collector chose, if they have not nominated one of the characters you showed them, they die. :reminder: Mark them with a shroud and *"Dies tonight"*
name: Tax Collector
ability: You start knowing 2 in-play characters, then choose a night*. If you haven't nominated 1 of those characters by that night, you die.

jinxes.reason: If the Lycanthrope is alive and the Tax Collector kills themselves, nobody else can die tonight.

otherNightReminder: If no-one died yesterday, wake the Vampire, and show them 1 out-of-play character for every day they survived. The Vampire dies. :reminder:
name: Vampire
ability: Each night*, if no-one died yesterday, you die, then learn 1 out-of-play character for each day you survived.

jinxes.reason: If the Lycanthrope is alive and the Vampire kills themselves in the night, no one else can die tonight.

firstNightReminder: Wake a Minion. Show them the Parvenu token, then point to the Parvenu. Mark them with *"Jealous"* :reminder:
otherNightReminder: If the *"Jealous"* Minion was not, by your judgement,"mad" about the Parvenu being evil yesterday, you may decide to kill them. :reminder:
name: Parvenu
ability: 1 Minion starts knowing you. Each night*, if they weren't "mad" about you being evil yesterday, they might die.

jinxes.reason: Riot registers as a Minion to the Parvenu.
If the Marionette is the only Minion, the Parvenu learns this and has no ability.

firstNightReminder: The Demon chooses a player tonight, unlike normal: mark that player with "Dies in 1 night". Wake the Fencer. Show them the player marked with the "Dies in 1 night" reminder. Replace that reminder at the end of today; that player dies when the Demon chooses.
otherNightReminder: Do not kill the player the Demon chooses; instead, mark them with "Dies in 1 night". Wake the Fencer. Show them the player marked with the "Dies in 1 night" reminder.  Replace that reminder at the end of today; that player dies when the Demon chooses.
name: Fencer
ability: The Demon attacks on the 1st night, but its’ victims die 1 night later. Each night, you learn who the Demon chose.

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Al-Hadikhia's choices are announced 1 night later.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Au’Wre guesses on the first night, but its guesses go through 1 night later. If they guess correctly, the Duelist learns this, otherwise the Duelist learns nothing.

firstNightReminder: The Haruspex shakes their head no or points to a player. If they point to a player, mark them with *"No ability"* :reminder:. If they pointed to a Demon, swap that Demon's character with a living Minion's (if able), then inform the swapped players of their new characters.
otherNightReminder: The Haruspex shakes their head no or points to a player. If they point to a player, mark them with *"No ability"* :reminder:. If they pointed to a Demon, swap that Demon's character with a living Minion's (if able), then inform the swapped players of their new characters.
name: Haruspex
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: chosen Demons swap characters with a living Minion (if able).

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

firstNightReminder: If the Inventor has an ability, run that ability.
otherNightReminder: If the Inventor has an ability, run that ability.
name: Inventor
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately design your ability: learn a condition. When met, you gain that ability.

name: Clairvoyant
ability: If you died last night, you may visit the Storyteller today to learn 1 fact about the Demon's bluffs.

jinxes.reason: If Leviathan is in play and the Clairvoyant is executed, they may visit the Storyteller tomorrow.
If Riot nominates and kills the Clairvoyant, they learn this tonight and may visit the Storyteller tomorrow.
If Lil' Monsta is in play and the Clairvoyant dies at night, they learn a fact about what the Minions are bluffing as.
If Au'Wre guesses the Clairvoyant, they learn this and may visit the Storyteller tomorrow.

name: Pilgrim
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn a Traveller the Storyteller would like to travel in, and a hint as to why.

name: Crime Writer
ability: The Demon also has the Butler’s ability. [-the Butler]

name: Escape Artist
ability: Once, at dawn, you may declare that if a good player dies today, good loses, but if evil dies, you learn who the Demon is. If you died, you must.

firstNightReminder: Pretend to the Wind-Viced they have the Minion ability they think they have. If it is in play, it is an Au'Wre game; do not run Minion info.
otherNightReminder: Pretend to the Wind-Viced they have the Minion ability they think they have.
name: Wind-Viced
ability: You think you are a Minion, but you are not. [The Demon is Au'Wre]

jinxes.reason: The Mathematician learns if Au'Wre guessed the Wind-Viced.

otherNightReminder: If the Turncoat was more "mad" than anyone else about wanting to execute the player who is the Demon, wake them up and show them the "You are:" card, then give them a thumbs down. Show them the "Your Demon is:" card, then point to the Demon.
name: Turncoat
ability: If you are the most “mad” about wanting to execute the Demon player, you become evil tonight & learn who the Demon is.

jinxes.reason: If the Turncoat is the most mad that a Riot player should be nominated and killed, and they do not die that day, the Turncoat turns evil that night.

firstNightReminder: Show each of the in-play Good characters in no particular order to the Sallow. They indicate one of those on their character sheet; mark them with a *"Might misregister"* reminder. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: If a player with a "Might misregister" reminder :reminder: died tonight or yesterday, wake the Sallow. They indicate a good character on their character sheet: mark them with a "Might misregister" reminder.
name: Sallow
ability: You start knowing which opposing characters are in-play. Then, choose 1 of them: they might register falsely. If they die, choose again.

jinxes.reason: The Heretic registers as an out-of-play Good character to the Sallow. They know which. If the Sallow picks this character, the Heretic misregisters instead.

otherNightReminder: The Spectre points to 2 Townsfolk or Outsiders on their character sheet. Mark a chosen in-play character with *"Clouded"* reminder :reminder:
name: Spectre
ability: Each night*, choose up to 2 good characters: you & the Demon register falsely to those abilities (if in play).

name: Vessel
ability: 1 Demon is marked on the script with 🕱. If the Demon dies & 5 or more non-Travelers live, become the marked Demon.

jinxes.reason: If the Demon dies and both the Vessel and Scarlet Woman are alive, they wake together and choose which of them becomes the Demon.
If the Imp chooses themselves and dies, the Vessel does not become the Demon.
If the Fang Gu chooses an Outsider and dies, the Vessel does not become the Demon.
If the Lil' Monsta is marked and the Demon dies, the Vessel begins babysitting Lil' Monsta and loses their ability.
If the Vessel becomes Riot, all evil players become Riot. If this happens after Day 3, the game continues for 1 more day.
If the Vessel Al-Hadikhia resurrects the original Demon, they become a Vessel again.
The Vessel only becomes the marked Demon when the Zombuul truly dies.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Vessel ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.

firstNightReminder: If another player chooses the Wind Nymph with their ability at night, all negative effects of that ability are removed, and that player swaps characters with the Wind Nymph: show each their new characters. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: If another player chooses the Wind Nymph with their ability at night, all negative effects of that ability are removed, and that player swaps characters with the Wind Nymph: show each their new characters. :reminder:
name: Wind Nymph
ability: You are safe from evil abilities. The 1st evil player to choose you with their ability each night swaps characters with you. [+1 Outsider]

jinxes.reason: If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Wind Nymph ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.

firstNightReminder: If the Trizkidek added an Outsider during setup, mark them with *"added Outsider"* :reminder:
otherNightReminder: The Trizkidek chooses either 1 or 3 players (3 if they removed an Outsider, 1 if they added 1). Mark one of the players they chose with *"Poisoned until dusk"* :reminder:: they are poisoned. Then, mark one of the players they chose with *"Dies"* :reminder:: they die
name: Trizkidek
ability: Each night*, choose 3 players: 1 is poisoned until dusk & 1 dies. If you added an Outsider, choose 1 instead. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Unseelie chooses a player :reminder:: mark that player with *"Dies"*, and a shroud: they are dead. If it was an Outsider, mark them with *"Secretly Dead"* :reminder: instead; they are dead, and any abilities that trigger based on death trigger, but they are not announced as dead until they're executed.
name: Unseelie
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Outsiders you kill register as and think they’re alive until executed. [+1 Outsider]

jinxes.reason: If Unseelie is executed while the Mastermind is in play, Outsiders they've killed continue registering as and thinking they are alive.
If the Unseelie kills the Escape Artist and causes them to misregister, they only have to use their ability when they learn they died.
